ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: I am not going to chase away the muminun.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: I am certainly not one to drive away the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: It is not for me to repel those who choose to believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: I do not drive away the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And I will not repel the Muslims.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And I am not going to drive away the believers."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And I am not going to drive away the believers;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: I would not drive away the believers;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And I am not (here) to repulse believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: I am not going to drive away any believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And I am not to drive away the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: I will not drive away the faithful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: I am not one to drive away those who believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And I am not going to drive away the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: I will not drive away the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And I am not about to drive away the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And I am not one to drive away the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:114] And I am not about to drive away the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And I am not (here) to repulse believers) from the worship of Allah.
